title: Ranked Preference
body:
How is the ranked preference calculated?
I am certain the amount of solo games I play greatly outnumber the amount where I play with 1-2 other premades but I still get dynamic preference.
I play with a premade like once in every twenty games, is this too much?

replies.body: Ranked emblems update based on your most recent ranked matches played and on the overwhelming majority of the type you played.  We actually updated our [Ranked Emblem](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209346066-Ranked-Emblems) guide recently and broken down the calculations for some more visibility.  Hope that helps clear things up!
